an5.229:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of a black snake.
an5.229:1.3: It’s filthy, stinking, cowardly, frightening, and treacherous.
an5.229:1.4: These are the five dangers of a black snake.
an5.229:2.1: In the same way there are five drawbacks of a female.
an5.229:2.3: She’s filthy, stinking, cowardly, frightening, and treacherous.
an5.229:2.4: These are the five drawbacks of a female.”
